text.section: In this subtitle the following words have the meanings indicated.

section.section: "Employee" means an employee (as defined in § 5-101 of this title) or former employee when the individual may be exposed under normal operating conditions or foreseeable emergencies.
"Employer" means an employer (as defined in § 5-101 of this title) and includes a volunteer fire, ambulance, or rescue company.

"Employer" does not include a farmer who:
uses a hazardous chemical in farming; and
complies with the applicable requirements of the Federal Insecticide, Fungicide, and Rodenticide Act.
